DOC.detailed_description: Some recent data suggest beneficial effect GnRHa administer luteal phase outcome assist reproduction technique . In study , dose administration time GnRHa inconsistent . Single administration third day embryo transfer multiple dose injection luteal phase common way . The GnRHa include Triptorelin 0.1mg , Leuprorelin 1mg Buserelin 600ug et al . The exact underlying mechanism still clear , although hypothesize GnRH agonist either support corpus luteum function induce LH secretion pituitary gonadotrophin cell stimulate endometrium GnRH receptor . Tesarik et al.postulated direct effect GnRH agonist embryo , evidence increase Î²-HCG secretion . Currently , available data suggest inadvertent administration GnRH agonist conception cycle accompany increase risk birth defect . On basis currently strong available evidence , appear GnRH agonist supplementation luteal phase significantly improve outcome ART treatment . Most former research focus fresh embryo transfer IVF/ICSI cycle . In one prospective control study , single dose Triptorelin 0.1mg administrate 6 day ICSI oocyte donor cycle implantation rate improve significantly.GnRH agonist administration time implantation enhances embryo developmental potential , probably direct effect embryo .
